div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1149 Kerch' (anc. Panticapaeum), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1852 Burial: 47-44 B.C. Contents: 55+ AE. Pot hoard Asander: 40 AE (as BMC ?) Amisus and Sinope 15 AE ("different types," time of Mithradates VI?) Disposition: Leningrad 15 (merged with main collection) Sibirskii, ZOOID to (1877), p. 39 â€ Liutsenko, p. 10
